quote: Simplify your life. You don't grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: When there is a tendency to compartmentalize the spiritual and make it resident in a certain type of life only, the spiritual is apt gradually to be lost.
author: Flannery O'Connor,  Mystery and Manners: Occasional Prose

quote: When you find yourself in need of spiritual nourishment, it is in the opportunities to serve others that you will find the abundance you seek.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life - mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical.
author: Julius Erving

quote: Spirituality exist in testing and experiencing the depth of inner peace consistently.
author: Amit Ray

quote: When we lose our spiritual child then that is when we have grown old.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: There is nothing more important to true growth than realizing that you are not the voice of the mind - you are the one who hears it.
author: Michael A. Singer,  The Untethered Soul: The Journey Beyond Yourself

quote: When every situation which life can offer is turned to the profit of spiritual growth, no situation can really be a bad one.
author: Paul Brunton

quote: Maintaining spirituality and humanism are the keys to success. It's a balance.
author: Bikram Choudhury

quote: Spirituality is recognizing and celebrating that we are all inextricably connected to each other by a power greater than all of us, and that our connection to that power and to one another is grounded in love and compassion. Practicing spirituality brings a sense of perspective, meaning and purpose to our lives.
author: Brené Brown,  The Gifts of Imperfection: Let Go of Who You Think You're Supposed to Be and Embrace Who You Are

quote: The spiritual life does not remove us from the world but leads us deeper into it
author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quote: While spirituality provides an efficient and endless fuel for your mind and body, you must burn that fuel with human action towards your goals, dreams, and desires.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The greatest hindrance to growth in faith is comfortable living.
author: John Carey

quote: Even the juncture in history and the zeitgeist we live in is something we choose, setting the scene for the spiritual fodder we need to grow and achieve deeper elevation of our souls.
author: Raquel Cepeda,  Bird of Paradise: How I Became Latina

quote: I think you grow wherever God plants you. I hope I'm growing as a person of faith, as a Christian. That should be our number one objective this journey of life. That all starts with a personal intimate relationship with Christ and then being in prayer every single day about all of those things - being tenacious about it.
author: J. C. Watts

quote: Spirituality is not to be learned by flight from the world, or by running away from things, or by turning solitary and going apart from the world. Rather, we must learn an inner solitude wherever or with whomsoever we may be. We must learn to penetrate things and find God there.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: You do not need to work to become spiritual. You are spiritual; you need only to remember that fact. Spirit is within you. God is within you. (67)
author: Julia Cameron,  God is No Laughing Matter

quote: When you mature in your relationship with God you realize how suffering and patience are like eating your spiritual vegetables.
author: Criss Jami,  Diotima, Battery, Electric Personality

quote: The striving of humanity for knowledge and truth [can] not be suppressed. The growth of the spirit [is]an essential part of Creation; it was planned like the growth of the body, of the plants and animals and people - every living thing that God had created.
author: Peter Prange,  The Philosopher's Kiss: A Novel

quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Spiritual victory is not something you earn - it is something you accept. The Christian life is not so much about what you have done - it's about what Christ has done. It's not so much about how strong you are - it's about how strong God is.
author: Alan D. Wright,  Lover of My Soul: Delighting in God's Passionate Love

quote: As we grow detached from things, we come (with God's help) to master our desires, and we give the mastery over to God. Discipline and divine grace heal the intellect and the will of the effects of concupiscence. We can begin to see things clearly.
author: Scott Hahn,  Lord, Have Mercy: The Healing Power of Confession

quote: The older I grow and the more I abandon myself to God's will, the lessI value intelligence that wants to know and will that wants to do; andas the only element of salvation I recognize faith, which can wait patiently,without asking too many questions.
author: Umberto Eco,  The Name of the Rose

quote: What the spiritual journey is all about is uniting our will with God's will, wanting what He wants, loving what He loves, living a life that in all its aspects honors Him and gives Him glory.
author: Ralph Martin,  The Fulfillment of All Desire: A Guidebook for the Journey to God Based on the Wisdom of the Saints

quote: Whether in the intellectual pursuits of science or in the mystical pursuits of the spirit, the light beckons ahead, and the purpose surging in our nature responds.
author: Arthur Stanley Eddington,  The Nature of the Physical World

quote: Spirituality and Aging Spirituality comes naturally to the old because they're running out of options.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I don't profess any religion; I don't think it’s possible that there is a God; I have the greatest difficulty in understanding what is meant by the words ‘spiritual’ or ‘spirituality.'[Interview, The New Yorker, Dec. 26, 2005]
author: Philip Pullman

quote: Faith reveals the potential.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: There are many sources of spirituality; religion may be the most common, but it is by no means the only. Anything that generates a sense of awe may be a source of spirituality. Science does this in spades.
author: Michael Shermer

quote: Inner peace is impossible without patience. Wisdom requires patience. Spiritual growth implies the mastery of patience. Patience allows the unfolding of destiny to proceed at its won unhurried pace.
author: Brian L. Weiss,  Muchas Vidas, Muchos Maestros

quote: Religious structure often dilutes the spiritual experience.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The Christian life is not about pleasing God the finger-shaker and judge. It is not about believing now or being good now for the sake of heaven later. It is about entering a relationship in the present that begins to change everything now. Spirituality is about this process: the opening of the heart to the God who is already here.
author: Marcus J. Borg,  The God We Never Knew: Beyond Dogmatic Religion to a More Authentic Contemporary Faith

quote: Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: You grow by educating yourself to be more aware and more conscious.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There are two types of seeds in the mind: those that create anger, fear, frustration, jealousy, hatred and those that create love, compassion, equanimity and joy. Spirituality is germination and sprouting of the second group and transforming the first group.
author: Amit Ray

quote: When you cultivate a godly thought life your soul will shine and you will exhibit the presence of the Lord in you.
author: Elizabeth George,  A Woman's High Calling

quote: What you are, and who you are should provide greater clarity about where you have been and where you are headed. Although one distinguishes spiritual from physical nature, the ultimate unification of the two is the consequence of the struggle for internal, external and eternal – peace.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Only by examining our personal biases can we truly grow as artists; only by cultivating empathy can we truly grow as people.
author: Jen Knox,  After the Gazebo

quote: Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divinity within you.
author: Amit Ray,  Meditation: Insights and Inspirations

quote: Like nature, we must grow with tranquility, beauty, harmony, and love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I've always been spiritual but I've never had a proper context, and it took me a while to find the proper context. It's hard to realize you can have any kind of relationship with God you want... and so I now have a punk rock relationship with God
author: Billy Corgan

quote: Spiritual pain is when you can’t stand another moment not knowing the real truth, and when you finally do know you can’t let go.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Trust and faith bring joy to life and help relationships grow to their maximum potential.
author: Joyce Meyer,  Battlefield of the Mind: Winning the Battle in Your Mind

quote: I am deeply spiritual; I revel in those things that make for good - the things that we can do to shed a little light, to help place an oft-dissonant universe back in tune with itself... Long live art, long live friendship, long live the joy of life!
author: Jessye Norman

quote: As we learn, grow and prosper, consciousness takes on new expressions and intrinsically searches for purpose and meaning.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Spirituality is not about being fixed; it is about God's being present in the mess of our unfixedness. (Messy Spirituality)
author: Mike Yaconelli

quote: We do not grow absolutely, chronologically. We grow sometimes in one dimension, and not in another; unevenly. We grow partially. We are relative. We are mature in one realm, childish in another. The past, present, and future mingle and pull us backward, forward, or fix us in the present. We are made up of layers, cells, constellations.
author: Anaïs Nin
